law.text: Upon the establishment of a city-county department of health under KRS 212.640, the property of the city board of health of the city and the property of the county board or department of health shall be transferred to the city-county department, and the city-county board of health shall assume control of any institutions formerly under the control of the city or county board or department of health.
law.history: Amended 2014 Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 272, effective January 1, 2015. -- Created 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 122, sec. 6.
